junior.job_path_description: This beginner track introduces foundational concepts of Kubernetes and cloud-native technologies, ideal for aspiring cloud engineers.
junior.title: Junior Kubernetes & Cloud Engineer

medior.job_path_description: This intermediate track focuses on deploying, developing, and securing Kubernetes-based applications across clusters.
medior.title: Kubernetes Platform Engineer

senior.job_path_description: This advanced track is designed for seasoned professionals managing multi-cluster environments and ensuring production-grade security.
senior.title: Senior Kubernetes Cloud Architect
